[8/10 rating] Behavior Digital Inc. really gives an extraordianary design of games where players tend to interact with the environment that they adapted to. Furthermore, for the killer part is more like an instinct behavior of surviving in harsh choices. Players will tend to give emotions towards the game even towards others because of this interactive multiplayer game.

Players already seen the behavior of others, well there is skill in this matter. I'm not saying that this will help you from certain chase of a psychopath or a serial killer no. It tests our instinct of choices and adaptivity. 

The game content is well, not to shabby i guess, balancing in this type of gameplay is quite hard but acceptable. Between an unexperienced survivors they sometime tend not know what to do, but the killer only has one purpose just plan course of action, stab the hell out of them, and sacrifice the survivors. If players uses survivor and test it all the time, they get some points to redeem it for talents. Well, this is quite a downer to me. Talents earned are so fast that the graphics on reaching the point where the killer needs to do the hard work from now on

Last, its about the mechanics and system. First of all the mechanics, the mechanics of the game is quite acceptable from TPS view for the survivors and the FPS view for the killer I think its quite fair. Controls are definitely good to me, but for the "falling down the wooden part to escape" is lack in responds. For this game system, you guys really need A GOOD INTERNET CONNECTION. This is the part what I hate about, at first I don't want to buy this game because of waiting for players part, or disconnecting and so, but the least to prevent that is to having good internet connection. 

In conclusion this game has been adapted quite well, a 8/10 spot for me. 

Pros:
-Creative gameplay
-Acceptable controls
-Interactive graphics
-Marvelous sound effects and BGM

Cons:
-Game balancing harsh
-Unfriendly internet connection properties

[ADVICE] : Try making a server for each region if can, but it really costs a lot. For connections support

Either a very fun game to play - or an extremely annoying one. The lack of ranking system is really getting to me - constantly put against people who are very high rank whilst I am still very low (and new to the game). Not really much fun when you are playing against somebody who is so much better than you. I also find that the "circle" areas where a player can literally run in circles and avoid the killer for an infinite amount of time to be a tad silly. Experienced players just run straight to these areas and you can never catch them.

Overall, fun - worth the money for sure. But I feel the things I listed above really need to be sorted.
This is a 9.5/10

Overall it's a game you should check out.

I was being carried but managed to wiggle my way off the killers shoulder. My buddy opened the gate and came back for me. He found the killer and distracted him the entire time. I crawled like a turtle to the exit. 10/10!
We did pretty good job so far.

Playing Dead by Daylight with friends is one of the most fun experiences I have had in a long time.  The constant suspence that the killer is cloaking right behind you, or ready to charge you with his chainsaw is amazing.  I recomend that if you have five friends who have this game it will be the most fun you've had in a long time.  The one thing I would have to say that is bad is that it is hard to run on best quality and best resolution unless you have a really good computer.  I have a decent computer and on medium or low quality can run it fine.
希望官方能出中文版。

I Played this game for couple of hours, and personaly I think Dead by Daylight is one of the best horror/multiplayable game
However, there's some down sides of this game

#Pros
-Great atmosphere
-Enjoy the thrill as being hunted, and the adrenaline while hunting
-Great game to play with friends (Upgraded version of hide&seek)
-Love the killer's ability and its perks, especially the wraith as it can spook people easily

#CONS (the most annoying things I felt while gaming)
There's one and only con/fact about this game, which is...
IT'S HARD FOR THE KILLER TO PLAY....

1. BALANCE
Clearly, the killers have downhand while playing. Of course, the killers have faster speed and have special abilities that can chase the survivors down. However, survivors have 1 ultimate tool to surpass all of that, which are WINDOWS AND LEDGES. For example, the map where there's more than 2 windows at the same spot (Autohaven Wreckers), the killers (the Wraith, and the Hillbilly) can't  do anything but watch them tease. The trapper might set the trap, but while he's setting it, they run away. I know that the team has patched for the "Sprint" perk, which was bloody op, but they should either get rid of the # of windows or make a cooltime/exhaustion system that when they vault more than 3 windows, their next vaults will be slower for few seconds (like the quiet vaults when they walk/vault to make no noise).

2. INTENTIONAL DISCONNECTING
Some tryhards that plays the game not for fun, but to win ,disconnects everytime when they can't escape. They tease the killer around the game, like vaulting the windows and sitting up and down etc., and when they get caught, they simply disconnect. This is partially because the ranks doesn't get effected whenever they disconnect. I really hope the team to patch the ranking system, that whenever someone disconnects, they get to lose 1 stack in their rank , which is the stack you need to level for next rank (for example, you need 3 to upgrade from 20 to 19) I understand that there are some people that gets disconnected against their will. but the truth is, there are more people that uses this system to gain their personal advantages than the people who gets disconnected against their will. I know that they had patched that the killers gets a reward as a "sacrifice" instead of getting none, but  a glitch makes this patch somehow useless. Whenever the killer picks someone up, and the survivor disconnects at that moment, the killer glitches out and stands still for a lo~~~~~~ng time (I waithed minutes until I could move again). Unable to move, and see the survivors escape without any problem. So, I personally hope that the team patch something "more".



Dead by Dailght is a great and fun game to play, but I believe that game can get better.

This game would of been a game if there wasn't so many bugs and it definitley needs a lot more balancing, I will list examples below.

1. There needs to be an online party system, when you want to play with a friend or two it gets annoying when you have to jump server to survivor looking for them, but what about cheating? well with the spectating mode there is no real way of cheating seeing how both the player and the spectator have to be looking at the same thing.

2. Jumping from server to server can easily crash your game, I have been at it for an hour trying to find my two friends and out of that hour I have crashed about 7 - 8 times. First it starts off with your character duplicating itself, then bringing you into a screen with the UI and some floating trees, once in this screen you can not access any of the UI elements.

3. Matchmaking is not totally fair, new players are getting matched with rank 1 level 50 characters so the game has basically decided who wins. There should of been quite a bit more thought put into that aspect because some of the perks the higher levels can use are quite over-powered.

4. Like I said some perks really need to be nerfed or atleast evened out a bit.

5. Also half of the time a patch is released it seems to make the game more buggier than it was before. Great job devs!

6. Now the jacket on Caludette is fairly glicthy, the right side of it is continously twitching, also the texture on the Trapper is off, his left shoulder and back doesn't match up. Small glitches like this should of been fixed before release.

No need to get mad after reading this, it is just my opinion on what's wrong with the game, and until some of this has changed this game is not worth the buy at full price.

Very good game, one of today's best multiplayer games, considering that many are cloying and annoying for his players, here in Dead By Daylight there are bad things that all players complain, and I have to agree, the game is very good, but the lack of balance between killer and survivor is something hORRIBLE in eg 'the Wraith', is a very unbalanced killer and is the most played so you just leaving the character without any cooldown on your main skill and with this, everybody is suffering from it, another thing is the lack of customization of the main character, as there are only 2 types of customization of clothing (taking off the level '' prestige '') the game ends up getting very repetitive, for example in times where on your team, there are 3 or 4 characters equal fault the lack of customization, and the last negative is not only mine, is all Brazilians who play the game, do not have the language option trading for Brazilian Portuguese is very sad for us Brazilians, especially in a game where you need to read what is written on their perks, addons, and offerings, many do not understand or that such item is or even if your perk is good or not, of course, some have a thorough knowledge of English and are able to '' understand '' what is written, all that is written in this text, it is something I would like you add or change in future updates.

Very glitch at this point to the point when I can't play the killer, but I'm hoping the lobbies will get improved/fixed so that one day killer online will actually work for me :( Thryed everything to fix it as well as everything surggested to fix lobby bugs...

Из минусов могу отметить:
- долгий поиск игры (особенно за маньяка)
- нет русской локализации (иногда сложно сообразить значение того или иного перка)
- нет возможности игры с друзьями (приглашать в общее лобби)

P.S Разработчики обещают пополнять игру новым контентом и добавить русскую локализацию, надеюсь со временем данные минусы отпадут сами собой.

Игра представляет собой этакое сочетание пряток и салок - всем известныхдетских игр. Прячутся четверо игроков-выживших (ну или жертв - как пойдет), а маньяк в свою очередь старается их найти и насадить (на крюк :)).  Все участники управляются игроками. В течение игры выжившие должны включить несколько генераторов, разбросанных по карте игры, чтобы найти выход и спастись. Игра отлично передает атмосферу всем известных фильмов-слешеров в стиле Пятницы 13. При приближении маньяка начинает громко стучать сердце не только у управляемого несчастного, но и у самого игрока, так что море впечатлений гарантировано. Да и в общем у игры явно большой потенциал дальнейшего развития. Но надо упомянуть и одну важную негативную техническую особенность игры - возможность создать лобби только если один из друзей играет маньяком, поэтому играть пока удобно компанией от четырех человек. Однако разработчики в курсе и работают над решением этой проблемы.

I recommend getting this game only if you have friends to play with who don't take things too seriously. Otherwise it will be a love-hate relationship with it. It is a game where cooperation is key and there is no chat with other survivors unless you are on a voice call together outside of the game, If you don't have friends to play with for survivor then play killer. Killer can be fun and often times is. Just keep in mind no matter how you play the community is pretty toxic so avoid reading in game chat and keep your profile private or people will leave comments on your profile about you and how it doesn't align with their way of playing. If you got thick skin and don't take things too seriously you'll have alot of fun.

This game makes me sad. It is obvious that there are glimpses of brilliance in this game, but it is completely overshadowed by the multitudes of problems this game has.

One is the game balance issues, the devs are notoriously incapable in their attempts to balance the different killers. 
Moreso, any time the killers find any perk combo that is effective in this game it gets nerfed to a point where all the perks are made useless. Survivors, being the majority of players, do not get these problems. Devs listen to them really carefully.

The largest sin this game makes is that it has no dedicated servers, which is completely unforgivable. There is absolutely no reason why the killer should be the host. None. Example: I feel like i need more exp, so what do i do? Well i change the download region on steam to some faraway place (USA for example) and farm points like a looney because now the players are lagged to hell, they can't do shit.

There is only one game mode. One year after the release and the devs cannot even arse to do more game modes. Game gets repetitive really fast. The repetition is not helped by the completely irrelevant and badly implemented ranking system that brings into the game whiny userbase, but still does not manage to make the matchmaker to make games with equal LEVEL players, my lvl1 trapper WILL meet lvl25+ characters constantly, good thing i am the server so i can lag them!

I had more fun with the F13 beta (which was obviously not finished and had oodles of problems in it) than i have had fun in this game. This game is just more frustrating than fun, and i do not think it will ever get fixed. Ever.


Did i mention there are no dedicated servers? Honestly.

Dead by Daylight แปลกดี เราซื้อเกมนี้ตั้งแต่ วันแรกที่มันวางขาย Day1 แต่เรากลับเพิ่งจะมาเขียนรีวิวมัน หลังเล่นไปได้ 2พันกว่าชั่วโมง
.
เราเป็นคนนึงที่ชอบเกมอินดี้มากๆ เราแทบไม่ตามเกม AAA เลย เวลาว่างเราจะชอบนั่งดู "เกมใกล้วางจำหน่าย" นั่งดูแทบทุกสัปดาห์ว่ามีเกมไหนน่าสนใจบ้าง ครั้งแรก เราเห็น Dead by Daylight ในหน้าใกล้วางจำหน่าย ตอนนั้นเกมยังมีแค่วิดีโอสัมภาษณ์ทีมงาน กับ ภาพแมพ แค่นั้นเอง แต่เรามีรางสังหรณ์อย่างบอกไม่ถูกว่าเกมๆนี้จะต้องปังแน่ๆ และมันก็เป็นแบบนั้นจริงๆ เราจัดเกมนี้ตั้งแต่วันแรกที่มันวางขาย แล้วก็ยังเล่นมาจนถึงทุกวันนี้ ตอนนี้ก็ใกล้จะครบรอบ 5ปี เราเล่นเกมนี้มา 5ปีแล้วเหรอเนี่ย ไม่อยากจะเชื่อว่า เรายังสนุกกับมันอยู่ และยังไม่มีความคิดหรือความรู้สึกที่ว่าอยากจะเลิกเล่นเลยแม้แต่น้อย
.
ส่วนหนึ่งอาจจะเพราะ เราชอบทุกๆอย่างใน Dead by Daylight มากๆ ทั้งเนื้อเรื่องตรงๆ เนื้อเรื่องแอบแฝงต่างๆ คิดดู แม้แต่หน้า Lobby ที่มีกลุ่มคนนั่งอยู่ข้างกองไฟ กับฆาตกรยืนมองอยู่ ยังมีเนื้อเรื่องและ Story คือ Creative มากๆ เรารักเกมนี้แบบสุดใจ แม้มันจะไม่ใช่เกมที่สมบูรณ์แบบ มีบัค มีความไม่สมดุลอะไรบ้าง (ปกติของเกมที่มีการอัพเดตตลอดเวลา สมดุลไม่เท่าเรื่องปกติ ก็ปรับเรื่อยๆสนุกดี) ชอบเนื้อเรื่องเกม ชอบปูมหลังตัวละครเกม แม้แต่แผนที่(Map) ยังมีเนื้อเรื่อง / และสิ่งที่น่าสนใจมากๆคือ การเอาตัวละครจากลิขสิทธ์หนังหรือเกมอื่นมาใส่ใน Story ของตัวเองได้อย่างแนบเนียนและลงตัว
.
เกมนี้ผ่านมา 5ปี ยังมีโหมดการเล่นแค่โหมดเดียว คือ 4 VS 1 แต่เรากลับไม่เบื่อเลย เพราะ เกมนี้คาดเดาอะไรไม่ได้ เป็นความตื่นเต้นที่เล่นมาแล้ว 2พันกว่าชั่วโมง ประสบการณ์แต่ละเกมแทบไม่ซ้ำกันเลย ทั้งฆาตกร รูปแบบการเล่น Perk และ Ad-on ที่หลากหลาย ให้เผชิญหน้า / เพื่อนร่วมทีมทั้งดีและไม่ดี โง่และเก่ง ฆาตกรที่โหดและไม่โหด ผสมๆปนๆกันไป เป็นประสบการณ์ที่ไม่เคยซ้ำไม่เคยจำเจ ขนาดคุณที่เล่นเกมนี้จนเก่งแล้วก็ยังสามารถรู้สึกตื่นเต้นกับมันได้
.
ในมุมมองของผม Dead by Daylight ยังอยู่ได้อีกยาวๆครับ อาจจะสัก 10ปี หรือมากกว่านั้น ตราปใดที่ผู้พัฒนาและทีมงานไม่ทิ้ง คอยเพิ่ม Story เพิ่ม Killer หรือเอาตัวลิขสิทธ์เข้ามา เซอไพร้เรื่อยๆ คนก็กลับมาเล่นอยู่แล้ว / เกมนี้ผ่านมา 5ปี มีทั้งผู้เล่นหน้าใหม่ และเก่าทยอยกลับมาเล่นกันเป็นช่วงๆ เอาง่ายๆคือ เซิฟไม่เคยล้างงงงง (ทุกวันนี้หาห้องเร็วแล้วครับ เร็วมากด้วย)
.
มีหลากหลายเกมที่พยายามตามรอย Dead by Daylight มีทั้งเกมที่ประสบความสำเร็จ และไม่ประสบความสำเร็จ ไม่ว่าเกมไหนจะดีหรือจะสนุกกว่าเกมไหน มันอยู่ที่รสนิยมคนครับ เรื่องนี้เราไม่ว่ากัน แต่สิ่งหนึ่งที่การันตีความสนุก ความสำเร็จ และความยอดเยี่ยมของ Dead by Daylight ได้ คือ จำนวนผู้เล่นและยอดขายครับ

Итак на сегодняшний день игру довели до ума, на мой скромный взгляд естественно. Имею 4 ранг в данный момент на убийце. Мэйн киллер - Призрак, которого все считают самым слабым. Средние результаты катки - 2-4 убийств. В принципе все в игре устраивает, регулярно наказываю Дуайтов в розовых штанах думающих что они очень хорошие мансеры, а после читаю их плач о том какой я плохой, кэмпер+туннелер и  вообще я должен был смотреть как они нонстопом приседают у меня перед носом. От игры получаю удовольствие в общем. Но тут очень важны перки, так что без ДЛСок вы вряд ли обойдетесь, хотя если очень хочется то можно накопить через радужные осколки или использовать стоковые перки, в принципе с ними можно работать.
这款游戏真的很棒！团队合作中带着心机，暴力、惊悚、悬疑、伦理、这款游戏教会了我怎么卖队友，如果把屠夫引到队友那里坑队友，连挂壁也难逃我的大刀，我已经出神入化！

Симулятор Waintg'а, в основном больше всего времени я потратил на то чтобы подклчюиться к другу в публичное лобби, потому что разработчики не сделали возможность сквада - отряда, рекомендую ли я эту игру? Да, потому что 10/10 коннектов к другу
Аве Шусс!

Хорошая игра) Доставляет кучу эмоций , также затягивает своим геймплеем. Графика на высоте 8 из 10. Конечно, игра пока еще сырая главный минус это то что вы с друзьями не можете играть в  пати ( в ранкед мачтчах) и вам приходиться сидет и по 5-10 мин пытаться попасть друг другу в лобби, поэтому за эт опока игре огромный минус. Хотя разработчики обещаю дальнейшее развитие игры( появление новых карт, маньяков , предметов , перков и много другого). Так что игре  ставлю 7 из 10. Советую купить! 

Good game ) Delivers a bunch of emotions , as addictive with its gameplay . The graphics at the height of 8 out of 10. Of course , the game is still raw main disadvantage is that you and your friends can not play in a party ( in ranked matches ) and you have to sit for 5-10 minutes and try to hit each other in the lobby , so for et flask play a huge minus . Although the developers promise a further development of the game ( the emergence of new maps , maniacs , objects , and many other perks ) . So the game put 7 out of 10. I advise you to buy!

'Dead by Daylight' as a survival horror coop game has managed to execute the asymmetrical type gameplay very well compared to other games with similar style for example like 'Evolve' and the 'Left for Dead' series. I played Evolve and immediately did not like the game and I have played my fair share of Left 4 Dead, but neither have captured my interest quite like Dead By Daylight has.

The gameplay of the game focuses around 4 survivors and 1 killer, with randomly generated 'trails' or maps which have randomly spawned 'generators' and 'hooks' The aim of the survivors is to repairs 5 generators for  for the escape gates of the 'trial' to open so you can escape. The survivors are only equipped with items like a torch, first aid kit, map or a toolbox.  However, while doing this the killer will be hot on your heels. The aim of the killer is to try and stop you from doing this by using their trusty weapon to try and slice you to injure you. Two hits and the survivors are down and the other teammates will need to interviene and help you get back up on your feet.  If you are unfortunate enough to be caught by the killer they are able to carry you and take you took a hook, these hooks are spread out across the trial randomly and you will be stuck on a hook until either you get help from a teammate, or ultimately die. 

The game has up to 4 survivor characters currently at time of patch 1.0.2. 

[list]
[*] Dwight Fairfield - Skilled at working as a team and has perks which enables the team to stick together and stay alive
[*] Meg Thomas - Skilled at being agile and fast, and moving around quietly
[*] Claudette Morel - Skilled at healing and uses plants to help enhance her healing perks
[*] Jake Park - Skilled at being calm while under pressure
[/list]

These 4 survivors have unique perks which are specific to each character, the way you unlock these items and perks is a system called the 'Bloodweb' which is essentially a tree of items, addons, offerings and perks which can be unlocked with bloodweb points that you get from playing trials. Each of these items can be taken with you on the trials but if you die, you will lose the item and addons. The offerings are one time use items which can help you, for example. A certain offering help choose the type of map you will join next game, another offering helps increase the amount of mist on trails etc. The perks are permenant and you start off with being able to use 1 perk. As you gradually level up to 15,20,25 you can get 2,3,4 perks relating to your level. Each character levels up seperately so it may take a while to get each person up to have 4 perks.

The killers within the game currently at the time of the 1.0.2 patch are:

[list]
[*] The Trapper AKA "Chuckles" - Skilled at physical attacks and can use his bear traps to trap survivors
[*] The Wraith - Skilled at tracking and hunting down survivors, is capable of going invisible but unable to attack while in this state
[*] The Hillbilly - Skilled at chasing survivors, is equipped with a chainsaw which is his secondary weapon, can be charged up and used to charge at suvivors within a clear line of sight.
[/list]

Regarding the killers however, They do not have items which can be used, they do however have the same type of addons as the survivors which can help with the certain killers primary weapons along with their secondary skills. The killers also have perks which can help them detect and hunt the survivors. 

In regards to the balancing, there does need to be some fixes and work done so that the survivors and killers don't feel too overpowered with certain perks. 

Overall, I've been enjoying the game and at it's current state I would recommend it. It does need some work still to help balance out all the perks and there are a few graphical bugs. However, it does not impede the enjoyment of the game and it still makes the adrenaline rush when you are being chased by the killer or chasing survivors as the killers.

I find the game to be very fun, though there are some balance issues and bugs here and there. However devs are working hard to patch the game of said bugs & balance issues when they can and they have already released a few patches since launch. 

On top of that the devs are working on communicating with the community through dev streams & the /r/DeadbyDaylight sub-reddit, while also working on releasing testing environments that will allow the community to give feedback on upcoming changes.

If you're curious about the game I definitely recommend you visit one of the many great streams of the game available at Twitch.tv where you can see gameplay ranging from high-end players to newer players.

Absolut genial!

Das Lobbysystem hat aufjedenfall noch Verbesserungen nötig, jedoch kann man sich nicht beschweren wenn man mal was findet. :D

Killer:

Fallensteller: Wenn er gut gespielt wird, hat man wirklich keinen bock jemanden vom Haken zu retten. :C

Geist: Leute die ihn ganz am Anfang spielen, campen noch nicht. Oder welche die Fair sind, sonst kann man sich bei Geist eigentlich sicher sein, dass man denjenigen der am Haken hängt nicht mehr retten kann, es sei denn man macht ein Ablenkungsmanöver. ;D

Hinterwäldler: Der Killer gegen den ich immer noch am meisten Spiele, er ist bei guter Benutzung eine kleine Herausforderung, aber wenn man gut als Survivor ist, kann man sich schnell vom Kettensägensprint wegmogeln. :D

Krankenschwester: Sie hat in mir das Interesse geweckt selber mal Killer zu spielen..und OMG sie ist so unglaublich stark, habe 4 von 4 Runden hintereinander jeden Umbringen können, da sie einfach so eine schöne Benutztung hat, man muss die Teleportation einschätzen können, wenn man es einmal hat, ist sie meiner Meinung nach der stärkste Charakter! :3
___________

Überlebende:

Dwight Fairfield: Er ist nichts besonderes und der Charakter den man wirklich als letztes Leveln sollte! 

Meg Thomas: Sie hat Fähigkeiten wie "3 Sekunden lang 150% schneller rennen" was extrem gut in manchen Momenten sein kann, es ist hilfreich, aber wenn man pech hat, kann man das nicht mehr einsetzen, weil man in der freien Welt, wenn man nicht vom Killer verfolgt wird, nicht mehr rennen darf, sonst ist man ja wieder den Perk los.

Claudette Morel: Mein Hauptcharakter. Sie ist wirklich unsichtbar wenn man sie gut gestaltet, hat eine Fähigkeit die wirklich in extremen Situationen hilft, da sie sich selbst ohne irgendetwas anderes Heilen kann. Auch wenn es nicht stark klingt, es hilft mir in  so vielen Runden, das glaub man nicht. :D

Jake Park: Der meistgespielteste Charakter, hat auch eine Fähigkeit die ungemein Weiterhilft, indem er Haken sabotieren kann, kann er den anderen Helfen und somit verhinder das sie am Haken hängen. 

Nea Karlsson: Hab nicht viel von ihr gehört, außer das sie einen Perk hat, (dass wenn man einem Hohen Fenster in die Tiefe springt, oder von einem Berg runter kurz gestunt ist) mit dem sie das unterbinden kann.
______________

Ihr könnt euch hieran ruhig orierentieren, kann sein das ich nicht jedem seine Meinung treffe, das ist mir aber total egal, weil das hier schließlich meine ist. :P

Zusatz: Jeder Killer und Überlebende hat 3 Perks die nur diese eine Person haben kann. Offenbar kann man ab Level 30 die Perks erlernen, wie das aber abläuft muss ich mir noch anschauen.
Bin zurzeit erst Level 27 mit Claudette. :O

게임 자체는 재미있습니다. 하지만 중국인 살인마들이 방잡으면 핑 떄문에 게임 진행자체가 힘듭니다. 중국애들은 따로 서버 만들어서 관리해주길 바라는데 그럴 생각은 없을 것이니 중국애들 안만나기만 바라십시오 핑때문에 게임 못합니다.  중국애들 자기들이 잘하는줄 아는데 핑때문에 난 분명 파레트 넘어뜨렸는데 갑자기 순간이동하면서 파레트 지나가는 쓰레기같은 경험을 자주하게 될겁니다.
제발 살인마로 타국가서 게임은 자제바랍니다. 핑 때문에 그 지역 유저들한테 피해주는 겁니다. 특히 중국 쓰레기같은 핑폭 가장 심합니다.

Es treibt einen zur Weißglut aber macht Spass. Gibt noch ein paar ungereimtheiten und wenn man Idioten im Team hat kann man es vergessen. zudem sollte es eine saftige Strafe für das becampen geben. Das mit dem juken is jetzt nicht gerade op genug in manchen Maps, dass es gerechtfertigt ist, dass man direkt aufgeben kann wenn der Penner die ganze Zeit vor einem wartet. Da geschiehts dem recht wenn man ihn an der Nase rumführt. Macht die 5% Regel eben beim juken aber dann auch ne Strafe für das verdammte becampen! Un die Raben sind zwar ne nette Idee aber man kann die Spawnrate ja noch n bisschen höher drehen!
Aber das regt mich gerad enur so auf, weil ich gerade frisch ausm SPiel hier er kam um dampf abzulassen :D is alles garnicht so schlimm aber ein berechtigter Grund zum motzen. Lohnt sich auf alle Fälle! Muss nur eben besser werden :D
